EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_ThePlatform_Q114.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder 1/16: The Platform for Building Great Software
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We'd like to remind you of your registration for our upcoming webinar event, The Platform to Build Great Software, this Thursday, January 16, 2014. Event Details: Date: Thursday, January 16, 2014 Time: 9:00AM PST (San Francisco)/5:00PM GMT (London)
Join the Webex <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=660716833>
Event Number: 660 716 833
Teleconferencing Information:
- Live streaming will be available - US Toll Free: +1-855-749-4750 - US Toll: +1-415-655-0001 - Global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=107432872&tollFree=1> - Toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf> - Access code: 660 716 833
Have questions? Contact us <mailto:pivotal-operations@gopivotal.com>.
Regards, The Pivotal Team
Check out Pivotal P.O.V. Visit Our Blog >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/>
Delivering Pivotal One Read More >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/paas>
Follow Us: Twitter <http://www.twitter.com/gopivotal> | LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/company/gopivotal> | Facebook <http://www.facebook.com/gopivotal> | Google+ <https://plus.google.com/105320112436428794490>
